page.title: 16WHAT OUR AREA LOOKS LIKE.
page.content: The{style of building}in our area is wide and varied.We have areas of Victorian style homes with large gardens and modern detatched and semi detatched villas and bungalows with compact gardens.There are also Council owned flats and houses which serve a large number of people.Overcrowding is not a problem in our block and there are many{parks and recreation areas. One of our modern schools, built in 1961, was designed A.J SMITH my grandfather.Hotels also contrast old,such as the Hollybank and new, King Robert which was built next to the site of the Monument commemorating his famous battle.The surronding {countryside}is unmarred by coalbings or industrial sites and is either natural hill landor farms. There are no rivers or lochs but the land is criss-crossed with large burns.
